content.text: Kasa is an elderly woman from Raijin Island.
She is a short, wrinkled, elderly woman in a cloak.
She seemed to be quite hospitable, even to strangers, as she offered umbrellas to Urouge and his crew for their safety.
She first appeared when she sailed up to the Fallen Monk Pirates' ship and offered them umbrellas so they could dock at Raijin island.

elements.text: Her name comes from the word, "Kasa" (傘, "Kasa"), which is Japanese for "umbrella".
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 60 Chapter 594 (p. 19) and Episode 511, Kasa offers to sell the Fallen Monk Pirates umbrellas.
↑  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 216), Kasa's name is revealed.
